post.author: 김유나
post.content:
회사정보
회사명 Ministry of Finance, Human Resources Branch

주소 Canada Ontario  
  33 King St. W., 2nd Fl., Oshawa, ON L1H 8H5

홈페이지  

회사소개  


채용정보
직종 전산직  

직무 TECHNICAL ANALYSTS

고용형태  

모집기간  Apply by Jan 31, 2003

급여 $1,056 - $1,271 / week

근무지 Canada   Ontario 33 King St. W., 2nd Fl., Oshawa, ON L1H 8H5  


지원자격
학력  

자격증  

경력  

필요한기술 The Central Agencies I&IT Cluster's IFIS Project needs highly skilled, innovative individuals to join the project which will replace multiple financial systems with a single government-wide financial ERP application. You will provide technical support, administration/configuration of Oracle ERP Applications, end-user/system support of issues tracking and problem resolution.

working knowledge of Oracle Applications administrative support in large Oracle Applications implementation; demonstrated knowledge of Oracle Database/Applications 11, data flows within Oracle GL, AP, PO, AR, PA, Workflow; demonstrated experience with three-tier architecture, Unix, Windows/NT, TCP/IP, firewalls, Microsoft IE, Netscape Communicator; sound knowledge of incident/problem management; excellent communication, negotiation skills; analytical skills to identify, analyse, diagnose systems malfunctions, implement corrective action.


기타 신청시 File 3444 표시


지원방법
지원방법 By fax  

담당자  

전화 -- -- -  

팩스번호 905- 433- 6588
post.title: TECHNICAL ANALYSTS
